name: Lain
content: Qubit, Grandpa left you another one of his chores before he went into town.

name: Qubit
content: Oh no… please don't tell me it's more plowing again.

name: Lain
content: Not this time. The field in front of me still needs to be planted—but Grandpa said you have to do it *without moving at all*.

name: Qubit
content: Without walking? How am I supposed to reach all the tiles then?

name: Lain
content: That's the challenge! He wants you to rely on your programming skills this time. Grandpa said you'd understand what he meant once you tried it yourself.

name: Lain
content: So here's the task: fill the entire field with plants *purely through code*. No walking, no shortcuts—just logic and automation. I've activated the Challenge Grid system for you!

requirement.description: Plant and grow wheat on all Challenge Grid tiles

name: Qubit
content: Heh, figures. Sounds like something Grandpa would come up with. Alright, time to let my code do the farming!
